item.title: English Poor Laws
item.description: English Poor Laws: Historical Precedents of Tax-Supported Relief for the Poor: In 1601, England was experiencing a severe economic depression, with large scale unemployment and widespread famine.

item.title: Manifest Destiny
item.description: Manifest Destiny, an event of Westward Expansion from the Wild West In the 19th century US, Manifest Destiny was a belief that was widely held that the destiny of American settlers was to expand and move across the continent to spread their traditions and their institutions, while at the same time ==enlightening more primitive nations==.
